description.en: Samurai Legends is a GameFi metaverse set in feudal Japan. Rule digital patches of land, build, battle and earn riches in your quest to become shogun of the metaverse! A combination of NFTs, play-to-earn mechanics and samurai aesthetics make Samurai Legends one of the most standout gaming experiences on Binance Smart Chain.
